definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to have no time to (do sth)
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
see 不遑多讓|不遑多让[bu4 huang2 duo1 rang4]

sentences.english: Today, she says, the middle-aged of the middle class can take that path too.
sentences.chinese: 而當代的中年階層在這方面不遑多讓。

sentences.english: Phoebe: You guys. I'm sorry about your shopping.

definition: lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
inferior (often in the combination 毫無遜色|毫无逊色, not in the least inferior)
not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: to monopolize the limelight (idiom)/to get all the glory/to rank highest
lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
to step down gracefully (humble expression)/to concede defeat/to play second fiddle
lit. to speak of two things on the same day (idiom); to mention things on equal terms (often with negatives: you can't mention X at the same time as Y)
